title: How to Play Hi Ho! Cherry-O (For Kids and Adults)

steps.title: Choose a bucket color and put 10 cherries on the matching tree.
steps.content: Choose a bucket color and put 10 cherries on the matching tree. Pick what color you want to play with, and sit next to the tree and bucket of the same color. Put 10 cherries of your color into the slots on your tree. Depending on your version of Hi Ho! Cherry-O , you can play with up to 3 or 4 players.

steps.title: Let the youngest person be the first player.
steps.content: Let the youngest person be the first player. Alternatively, you can pick someone at random to go first. After them, the player to their left will take the next turn. [1] X Research source Hi Ho! Cherry-O is perfect for kids from 3–6 who are learning how to count.

steps.title: Spin the spinner and do what it says on your turn.
steps.content: Spin the spinner and do what it says on your turn. When it’s your turn, flick the game’s spinner. When it stops, look at what symbol it landed on and follow the directions below. Alternate turns with play passing to the left. Some versions of Hi Ho! Cherry-O come with the spinner pre-assembled, but you may need to put it together if it’s your first time playing. Break off the spinner base and the arrow, then insert the base through the hole in the gameboard spinner. Snap the arrow into the base on top of the gameboard spinner.

steps.title: One cherry
steps.content: One cherry Pick 1 cherry off of your tree and put it in your bucket.

steps.title: Two cherries
steps.content: Two cherries Take 2 cherries off of your tree and put them in your bucket.

steps.title: Three cherries
steps.content: Three cherries Pick 3 cherries off of your tree and drop them in your bucket.

steps.title: Four cherries
steps.content: Four cherries Take 4 cherries from your tree and put them in your bucket.

steps.title: Dog or bird
steps.content: Dog or bird Take 2 cherries out of your bucket and put them back on your tree. If you only have 1 cherry, put that one back. If you don’t have any cherries, you don’t have to do anything this turn.

steps.title: Spilled bucket
steps.content: Spilled bucket Dump out all the cherries from your bucket and put them back on your tree. Now you have to start over from scratch!

steps.title: Win the game when you put all 10 of your cherries in your bucket.
steps.content: Win the game when you put all 10 of your cherries in your bucket. Once you pick all the cherries off of your tree, shout out “Hi-ho! Cherry-O!” to let the other players know you’ve won. [2] X Research source
